scenario.data.holy_war.name: Holy War
scenario.data.holy_war.description: Since the Conjunction of the Planes, all the Citadels have been <style="status">corrupted</style>. You embark on a Crusade to <style="value">liberate the Citadels</style> from the ungodly creatures that occupy their walls.
scenario.data.holy_war.win.0: All the <style="value">Citadels</style> must be <style="status">Conquered</style> before the end of the last Round.
